last_episode_to_air.name: Plaid to the Bone
last_episode_to_air.overview: Joe, Anna and Jodie are on a wild ride-flung from a trebuchet and hurtling towards Castle Dunbar in Scotland during a siege in 1338 by the English Earl of Salisbury. But when the kids meet Uncle Joe in the dungeon they realize much more is at stake. Family conflict takes on a whole new meaning when Joe has to watch Uncle Joe and Uncle Mad Jack battle it out over the fate of the universe!

name: Time Warp Trio
overview: The adventures of three curious boys who are transported back to dramatically different places in history.
